Archives.description: Display a date archive of your posts. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#archives

Pattern.description: Create and save content to reuse across your site. Update the pattern, and the changes apply everywhere it’s used. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#pattern

Button.description: Prompt visitors to take action with a button-style link. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#button

Buttons.description: Prompt visitors to take action with a group of button-style links. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#buttons

Calendar.description: A calendar of your site’s posts. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#calendar

Categories List.description: Display a list of all categories. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#categories-list

Code.description: Display code snippets that respect your spacing and tabs. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#code

Column.description: A single column within a columns block. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#column

Columns.description: Display content in multiple columns, with blocks added to each column. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#columns

Comment Author Avatar (deprecated).description: This block is deprecated. Please use the Avatar block instead. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-author-avatar-deprecated

Comment Author Name.description: Displays the name of the author of the comment. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-author-name

Comment Content.description: Displays the contents of a comment. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-content

Comment Date.description: Displays the date on which the comment was posted. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-date

Comment Edit Link.description: Displays a link to edit the comment in the WordPress Dashboard. This link is only visible to users with the edit comment capability. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-edit-link

Comment Reply Link.description: Displays a link to reply to a comment. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-reply-link

Comment Template.description: Contains the block elements used to display a comment, like the title, date, author, avatar and more. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-template

Comments.description: An advanced block that allows displaying post comments using different visual configurations. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments

Comments Pagination.description: Displays a paginated navigation to next/previous set of comments, when applicable. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-pagination

Comments Next Page.description: Displays the next comment’s page link. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-next-page

Comments Page Numbers.description: Displays a list of page numbers for comments pagination. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-page-numbers

Comments Previous Page.description: Displays the previous comment’s page link. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-previous-page

Comments Title.description: Displays a title with the number of comments https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-title

Cover.description: Add an image or video with a text overlay. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#cover

Embed.description: Add a block that displays content pulled from other sites, like Twitter or YouTube. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#embed

File.description: Add a link to a downloadable file. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#file

Footnotes.description: Display footnotes added to the page. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#footnotes

Input Field.description: The basic building block for forms. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#input-field

Form Submission Notification.description: Provide a notification message after the form has been submitted. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#form-submission-notification

Gallery.description: Display multiple images in a rich gallery. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#gallery

Group.description: Gather blocks in a layout container. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#group

Heading.description: Introduce new sections and organize content to help visitors (and search engines) understand the structure of your content. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#heading

Home Link.description: Create a link that always points to the homepage of the site. Usually not necessary if there is already a site title link present in the header. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#home-link

Custom HTML.description: Add custom HTML code and preview it as you edit. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#custom-html

Image.description: Insert an image to make a visual statement. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#image

Latest Comments.description: Display a list of your most recent comments. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#latest-comments

Latest Posts.description: Display a list of your most recent posts. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#latest-posts

List.description: Create a bulleted or numbered list. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#list

Media & Text.description: Set media and words side-by-side for a richer layout. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#media-text

Unsupported.description: Your site doesn’t include support for this block. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#unsupported

More.description: Content before this block will be shown in the excerpt on your archives page. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#more

Navigation.description: A collection of blocks that allow visitors to get around your site. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#navigation

Custom Link.description: Add a page, link, or another item to your navigation. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#custom-link

Submenu.description: Add a submenu to your navigation. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#submenu

Page Break.description: Separate your content into a multi-page experience. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#page-break

Page List.description: Display a list of all pages. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#page-list

Page List Item.description: Displays a page inside a list of all pages. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#page-list-item

Paragraph.description: Start with the basic building block of all narrative. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#paragraph

Author.description: Display post author details such as name, avatar, and bio. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#author

Comment (deprecated).description: This block is deprecated. Please use the Comments block instead. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comment-deprecated

Comments Link.description: Displays the link to the current post comments. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#comments-link

Content.description: Displays the contents of a post or page. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#content

Date.description: Display the publish date for an entry such as a post or page. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#date

Post Navigation Link.description: Displays the next or previous post link that is adjacent to the current post. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#post-navigation-link

Post Template.description: Contains the block elements used to render a post, like the title, date, featured image, content or excerpt, and more. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#post-template

Time To Read.description: Show minutes required to finish reading the post. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#time-to-read

Title.description: Displays the title of a post, page, or any other content-type. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#title

Preformatted.description: Add text that respects your spacing and tabs, and also allows styling. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#preformatted

Pullquote.description: Give special visual emphasis to a quote from your text. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#pullquote

Query Loop.description: An advanced block that allows displaying post types based on different query parameters and visual configurations. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#query-loop

No results.description: Contains the block elements used to render content when no query results are found. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#no-results

Pagination.description: Displays a paginated navigation to next/previous set of posts, when applicable. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#pagination

Next Page.description: Displays the next posts page link. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#next-page

Page Numbers.description: Displays a list of page numbers for pagination https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#page-numbers

Previous Page.description: Displays the previous posts page link. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#previous-page

Quote.description: Give quoted text visual emphasis. “In quoting others, we cite ourselves.” — Julio Cortázar https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#quote

Read More.description: Displays the link of a post, page, or any other content-type. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#read-more

RSS.description: Display entries from any RSS or Atom feed. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#rss

Separator.description: Create a break between ideas or sections with a horizontal separator. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#separator

Shortcode.description: Insert additional custom elements with a WordPress shortcode. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#shortcode

Site Logo.description: Display an image to represent this site. Update this block and the changes apply everywhere. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#site-logo

Site Tagline.description: Describe in a few words what the site is about. The tagline can be used in search results or when sharing on social networks even if it’s not displayed in the theme design. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#site-tagline

Site Title.description: Displays the name of this site. Update the block, and the changes apply everywhere it’s used. This will also appear in the browser title bar and in search results. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#site-title

Social Icon.description: Display an icon linking to a social media profile or site. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#social-icon

Social Icons.description: Display icons linking to your social media profiles or sites. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#social-icons

Spacer.description: Add white space between blocks and customize its height. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#spacer

Table.description: Create structured content in rows and columns to display information. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#table

Table of Contents.description: Summarize your post with a list of headings. Add HTML anchors to Heading blocks to link them here. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#table-of-contents

Tag Cloud.description: A cloud of your most used tags. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#tag-cloud

Template Part.description: Edit the different global regions of your site, like the header, footer, sidebar, or create your own. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#template-part

Term Description.description: Display the description of categories, tags and custom taxonomies when viewing an archive. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#term-description

Text Columns (deprecated).description: This block is deprecated. Please use the Columns block instead. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#text-columns-deprecated

Verse.description: Insert poetry. Use special spacing formats. Or quote song lyrics. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#verse

Video.description: Embed a video from your media library or upload a new one. https://developer.wordpress.org/block-editor/reference-guides/core-blocks/#video
